content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my kitchen at my computer and looking thru my window to the north northwest of skinners butte, i observed a large silvery white oval falling or rapidly descending from maybe 500-1,000 ft in the sky (slightly hazy blue) toward the ground.  the ground/horizon however is not actually in my line of sight (obscured by buildings).  the flash or reflection is what caught my eye in the first place before it fell or descended.  the "oval" was falling/shooting straight down with a short end being (up and down) while the long sides of the oval were (east/west).  i have never witnessed anything like this before and thought perhaps a wing had fallen off of a plane or a weather balloon was falling from the sky - but these dont seem plausible.  its a windy (10-14mph) day with shifts from onshore to southerly to even northwesterly. the object fell/shot straight down as though it had weight/mass.  before the event, i witnessed a white "learjet" type aircraft flying to the west of me about 15-20 minutes and about 15 minutes after the event i noticed another white "learjet" type airplane flying in the northwest, from perhaps the eugene airport (10 miles away).  when i observed the "oval" it was falling from what appeared to be 3-5 miles from my location.  no aircraft (plane or helicopter) were within sight when the "oval" flashed and fell/descended.  i have not heard sirens, seen smoke/fire or anything that would make this sighting an emergency situation. the "oval" flashed silvery white but was only white when it fell/descended.  this is the only sighting i have witnessed since i was 12 yrs old in 1962 and i witnessed a satin black, silently, low flying rectangular craft over my families back yard in late spring before sundown.
content.summary: In my kitchen looking north and slight northwest over skinners butte, i saw a silvery white oval shape larger than an airplane flash and drop or descend in a straight line very quickly from the sky to the ground within 2 seconds from 500 - 1,000 ft up.

content.detailedDescription: on one night in the fall while working on a sunroof i noticed a strobe light out over wades hill (a power line tower) no red or green lights so i thought it must be a new type of helicopter, so i watched it the light popped every few seconds and i notice it's moving way to slow to be a plane but it was on a slow path towards me, this night had a full moon and was pretty clear out so i stooped a bit to make the light pass in front of the moon, noticed it had no airplane or helicopter sound and then just as it was about to be right in the moons light right over me 3 multi colored lights came into view. these colors were nothing like i'm used to viewing colors(i paint cars for a living) each of the 3 lights changed it colors slowly then once it was full in the moon it had a perfect outline and noticed the strobe light was no longer visible only the 3 round lights which nearly covered all of the under surface and as it got about the same angle as when i notice the 3 lights vs the 1 strobe the strobe reappeared just under the machine aprox. 6 feet under it, not touching or connected to anything leaving me to think the 3 lights were making the strobe. there was a funny feeling in my body as it passed over me that went away as soon as i no longer could see 3 lights but just the 1 strobe it was a perfect concaved triangle with a dome on the top. i built machines the ones that build cars, as an automation tech i know machines and that one was not of this earth. since that incident i've had 3 more sighting 2 of them sure they were ufo's but that and 1 other time, no, easily identified. not ours. if you would like to discus this please join me on irc efnet #mufon i am ynot
content.summary: It wasn't unidentified, it was a machine not of this earth

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9-930 pm in the evening looking at the tv with my wife,and i happen to go out side to fix a light when something bright red came into view saw it was disc shape. ran into the house to alert my wife of what i was looking at...She got mad at me came out side looked up and said it was an airplane from  the dia airport and whent back into house. our house has lots of windows. when my wife yelled at me to come take alook at what she was seeing in the window what she tought to be fireworks..! one of the flying discs was right up close.. to the house saw it really well and joked with the wife and said it was an invasion! then it hovered over the house for a while,my wife told me to go out side and get a better look when i said no!She said are you afraid? are you scared they will take you! i said yes iam...And then i noticed 2 f16s and then the disc headed east and followed the other red disc at a great speed..Then i noticed two black copters headed in the same path..Scared! yes i was wow i hope we never, see this again.But we will never forget what was seen.By the way called the air force and they laughed at me..Im glad you people understand that they are here more and more and have been here for a long time! thank you!
content.summary: two bright red disc shapes

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on our way to daily mass.  we had just gotten out of the car when i looked up and saw a white cylindrical (could have been cigar-shaped) object flying from the south toward the northeast.  i said, "look at that."  he remarked that it was simply an airplane, but i disagreed as i could see no wings or trail, nor hear any sound emanating from the object.  i have seen similar objects 3 or 4 times in the past.  the object was white but had a darker section in the middle which could have been a bay of windows.  i was slightly excited but disappointed that my husband did not concur with my viewpoint of the sighting.  i lost sight of the object when i went into the church.
content.summary: White cylindrical object seen overhead in northern kentucky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car at work waiting for my relief to arrive so that i could leave. my shift is over at midnight. the sky was completley covered in clouds but i noticed a small spiral of clouds to left. nothing major, it was more of a swirl than spiral. i thought, maybe haarp? i took my camera out, put it on the night setting, got out of my car and took two pictures. i checked the preview to make sure the camera captured it because it was so dark and there's barely any lights in the area. i started looking around the sky and was shocked to see a huge dark shape in the clouds, high above my car. the spiral was to the left of my car and the shape was pointing in that direction and directly above me. i kept thinking maybe it's just a break in the clouds and all i'm seeing is the night sky. but the fact that it had visible straight lines and what appeared to be, a sharp point, made me want to take several more pictures. it was not moving at all. there was absolutely no sound or lights. i don't know how low the clouds were but the object seemed huge. i don't know anything about cloud altitude so it's hard to make an accurate guess of how high or big it was. i want to say the width appeared to be as wide as maybe 5 passenger jets side by side. i observed it for about 6 minutes until it seemed to slowly disappear and clouds filled in the area. something was there, that i know.
you can see power lines going across the images that have the object. my camera time is only off by the am and pm. i only reduced the size of the images so that i could email them. i did nothing else to the images.
content.summary: Observed a huge dark object hovering high in clouds directly above me and my car.

content.detailedDescription: Riding home from work and i took a picture of the clouds. after an observation of the photo taken using my cell phone there were two objects present. a white glowing round orb and a round dull grey object at a lower attitude. these objects could not be seen with the naked eye. this could be an explainable phenomena, however, it intrigued my interest.
content.summary: Riding home from work and i took a picture of the clouds. after an observation if the photo taken using my cell phone there were two object present. a white glowing round orb and a round dull grey object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving an rv south on the california 99 freeway around midnight on the night of august 23rd, 2012. i was accompanied by about six other sleeping people and one co-pilot, awake with me. we were approximately 45 minutes south of modesto california heading towards chowchilla california. from the south east, heading west, towards the freeway, i noticed what appeared to be a craft, what i originally thought was an airplane, descending on what looked like its final approach across the freeway ahead of us about five or six miles away, to the ground west of the freeway somewhere. i noticed lights in a pattern not unlike that of the side profile of an airlplane at night, something around the size of a piper or cesna. the lights were a bluish white and unblinking at the time. the first thing that caught me as strange was that i'd been on that stretch of road many times and i know for a fact that there is no airport out in that area. so if something was going down, it was going to be a crash landing. my grandfather was a pilot for the air force, and having raised me, imparted with me a quite sizable cache of knowledge about air flight and planes in general. so, the object came down over the freeway, as we continue to approach it, and when it reached the ground it proceeded to bounce off of it like a kite and stick straight up in the air and hover for a few seconds, about 20 or so feet in the air. it then began to dive into the ground and bounce off it many times, and it made standstill pitch and yaw movements that i can only describe as kite like. as if there were a breeze acting on this object and it was moving in it. it proceeded to "bounce" around for another 30 seconds to a minute, all pretty much in one place, and we began to pass it on our right as we were still driving down the freeway. at it closest, on our right, it was about 100 feet away and we could see no craft, only lights. looked like two or three on the side and maybe four in a row on front. i only say it had lights on the front because as it was parallel with us, to the west, it suddenly turned towards us and flashed four bright lights directly at our vehicle and the inside of the cockpit became a bright white blue. next, without any warning, it appeared to just become a light in the same direction on the horizon, now blinking like a far away airplane on the horizon. it appeared to become a light, i say, because if it moved it must have covered over 20+ miles in an instant. there was no stretch or motion of travel, it was just 100 feet to my right one second, and 20 miles away the next. at this point my friend and i are in shock, and i have the distinct impression that it scanned us when it shone the light at us. at first we thought the object was gone and that the light on the horizon was an actual airplane until we realized that it was following us, parallel, at a distance of about 20 or so miles, literally on the edge of vision on the horizon to the west (left of us.) it proceeded to slowly over take us, heading south, then it crossed the freeway about five miles ahead of us, to the east, then turned around and headed west again, in a very similar pattern to the one when we first saw it, descending again over the freeway as if to land. it crossed the freeway, and went down behind a gas station and dissappeared. as we passed the had station from the freeway i could see the attendant unaffected and standing motionless behind the counter, and behind the gas station where it appeared to go down was nothing. it disappeared into thin air. there was no covere and we could see for many miles on the horizon. i scanned the night for the remainder of my 2 hour driving shift and nothing else appeared.
content.summary: Watched a ufo come in to land, bounce off thee ground like a leaf, then shine a beam at me and take off at an extreme rate, follow me at a large distance, then loop around, come in to land again but dissappear completely with no cover.

content.detailedDescription: I was with friends on the driveway of my parents. my friend said what's that and point to the nw. i was looking in the distance but could not see it. he than said it right there and it was and 100ft away. it was a black triangle no sound and seemed to hover. there were white light in the corner a white red in the middle and a lead red light. it then seemed to just fly away and blended with the stars. this was in 1997 and since i was in the usaf for 7 years. i deployed 2x to iraq and have seen every aircraft from stealth bomber ch-53 osprey f-22 c-17 and many more. i have never seen anything else like it since and i truly believe what we saw was not of this world. again i have seen aircraft from the us and russia and never have seen anything like it. this was one reason i joined the usaf.
content.summary: Black triangle white on corners one in middle and a lead red light

content.detailedDescription: In spring or summer of 1948 in chicopee massachusetts home of westover afb, i was laying down in the grass with a childhood friend watching the clouds pass by when we both noticed a very square/rectangular odd shape craft that was obviously made of some kind of metal possibly aluminum mix. my eyes watched this aircraft cross the sky in a very very unreal way. the way that it moved was not like anything i had ever seen. it was not decending as if it was thrown out of an aircraft or dropped. it was flying top over bottom, flipping end over end while in flight. it was like nothing i had ever seen before. how can something fly in a straight line across the sky if it is turning and flipping end over end? there was no obvious sign of propulsion. no obvious sign of any type of engine and no engine noise. i seen this amazing sighting for about 2 minutes until it was no longer in sight. me and my friend never made mention of it until now. i would like to add that my brother as is in the faa. i am an avid photographer of airplanes and i also build them. i am the first person in the world to take in flight photos of many different types of planes and i am a founder of a club called wings and wheels. which is devoted to making scale models of aircrafts and such. i am familiar with what should and ahould not be in the sky. and this sighting was unreal. i would also like to add that i have no need to lie about anything . not looking for money of any kind. not seeking fame of any kind. simply would like to get to the bottom of what me and my friend saw in 48' when i was just a young boy. thank you.
content.summary: Fantastic sighting of ufo in 1948 . very odd shape. very odd way of flight. 5000 feet in air minimum

content.detailedDescription: I was on vacation and bowhunting deer. it was getting dark pretty quickly and i was thinking about getting down out of my deer stand. thats when out of the corner of my eye i caught what looked like a huge wild fire ablaze in the southeastern sky. i turned my head to grab my binoculars and when i turned back it was gone?? i thought to myself, what the heck? i got on my cell phone and called my buddy i was with and asked him if he had seen what i seen? he said he did see it. this guy i hunt with is a huge skeptic on everything! i told him i would meet him at the gate and we would head back home from there. while i was walking to my 4 wheeler from my tree stand (approx 1/2 mile) i seen red ball looking lights in the sky again. i stopped and watched them for a second or 2 and they would kinda like giro?? meaning they would be in a circle maybe 9 or 10 and they would multiply and the circle would get huge. i met up with my buddy and asked him if he seen it again and he said no. i told him what i seen while walking to my 4 wheeler and he laughed at me and said he seen bigfoot sarcasticly! i was kind mad that he didnt believe me. so we both were on 4 wheelers headed across a picked corn field headed home. i was in the lead when the lights appeared again. i stopped my 4 wheeler and my buddy pulled up beside me and he seen them too. then he didnt know what to think. he tried to say it was a plane. i know better. like i said he is a huge skeptic. anyway we both watched the lights for approx 10 minutes and all at once they were gone. funny thing is while we were both watching these lights they would form huge circles and then one of the red balls would drop straight down then 4 or 5 more would come off of that one. then they would all come back to each ball the form a huge ball again. they would pulsate then stay solid. it is the strangest thing i ever seen. finally the just vanished and that was it. while i was watching this i was in total awwe. i was just mystified at what i was seeing. the whole time i was thinking to myself, ( i knew they were real)!
content.summary: I was hunting the evening that it happened, i seen a red light that lit up the whole southeastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: Between 11pm and 12 am i sent a message on facebook to a friend and i don't remember anything i woke up on my porch extremely dehydrated and missing my clothes. my money was taken, my backpack is missing along with my meds and i feel like something happened. two days prior at about 10:30 pm i saw the brightest light through my bedroom i've ever seen kind of a bluish white color my dog went nuts and i ran to a friends house. please help me... no one is going to believe me i'm still trying to wrap my head around this and i am so scared right now
content.summary: I woke up outside my front door naked, dogs in house, door locked missing money and backpack.

content.detailedDescription:
I had been at a friends home near buffalo mn for a seminar. staying at her home with a few other people, one being a minister. i headed home sat afternoon so i could get ready for work.  as i drove away from my friends home my vehicle started running worse and worse then quit. i managed to get it started and drove back to my friends home. the vehicle ran perfectly by the time i was back.The minister said he prayed that i would come back. he needed to pray for deliverance for me.
went thru the deliverance that night. nothing changed in me.
i spent the following night at my friends home. 
woke that morning to her yelling frantically for me. she was clearly shaken. took me upstairs to her bed room. her husband had already left for work early am. 
she turned on the light and showed me the room. there was blood all over the bed, headboard, carpet, pillow. only on her side of the bed. she was done with her menstrual cycle and well into menopause when this happened. there went any blood on her- she undressed infant of me. . and asked me to tell her if she has blood or marks on her. she was so scared! at the point when i saw the blood a memory flagged thru my mind. i could see what happened. 
we called the minister and he told us what to pray. then we cleaned the blood out of everything. it took us half the day. my friend told me to not tell her husband. she was afraid of him knowing.

as for what happened: my memory is of two tall beings bringing me into her bedroom. they were going to teach me how they do what they do. but it was to be a lesson for me and a warning.  first they put a watery gel on my arms up past the elbows and had me pass my hands thru my body then the wall. then they made me touch my friend. then they opened her up- like filleting a fish or an autopsy. i could see every bone nerve vessels. then at one point i was told to do something and refused. it was a moral decision on my part. ethical as well. when i refused to do as told i was shoved back and told to watch. then told. humans need a lot of training to control their fears and emotions.
the people my friend told writing text horrified and i was asked to leave her home. i planned on leaving any how because i didn't want anyone else to be hurt.R
content.summary: At a frinds house. she woke up with blood all around her in bed

content.detailedDescription:
after the takeoff of my plane from jfk on my way to france,
i took a video of the fireworks over queens. 
on the video there is three to two bleu lights who moves and deasepeird after a few seconds..
content.summary: During firework in a plane

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my back yard with some friends and family when my nine year old daughter noticed three "stars" lined up in a row. she pointed them out to me. i immediately realized they were not stars. there were three white orbs and one red one in a row and a fourth one out in front of the other three to form a sort of triangle. they moved out of formation and seem to do a 90 degree turn. when they moved they had a red fire like tail behind them. they then went dark and came back in the same formation all lit up in the same manor. they then moved again and went dark. i obtained a small video which did not turn out good and attempted to view them with binoculars but did not get them in time. there were two adults and two children that witnessed the event. we then saw red glows out from under the tree line several times. we heard nothing.
content.summary: There were three orbs in a row and a fourth out infront of the others. one was red the others were white. they changed direction and then went dark. that happened twice.

content.detailedDescription: I was a kid playing in the neighborhood when a light that came from the sky and landed on the ground and opened up to show a room inside.  there was a light bulb hanging from the ceiling and a white wooden chair below it.  it then closed and went back up into the sky.  this all happened a few feet in front of me. i was frightened and i froze in my tracks as it happened.  i didn't see anyone in the phenomenon.  i only saw the light bulb hanging from the ceiling, the white wooden chair and white walls behind them.
content.summary: A light that came from the sky and landed on the ground and opened up.  it revealed a light bulb hanging from the ceiling and a wooden chair below it.

content.detailedDescription: Yes, there was about 30 of us at lake summerville in brenham tx. we were night fishing for crappie. beside us was four drunk men. they were starting to annoy everyone when they got quite as a mouse. everyone was wondering what the were looking at, when we all saw it. it looked like it was low enough to touch it. but it was above the tree lines. it was shaped like a submarine. and gray/black in color. it moved very, vary slow.From one horizon to the other. it seemed to take forever,  but was only about 10minutes. the tail end had iridescent trail behind it. (red, blue, green). not like a fire flame. i didn't know what to think i was only 10 at the time, but i remember i wasn't scared at all. but the four drunks, got out of there quickly. when we got back home, my mother called the local news channel and reported what we saw. the next day the news stated that it was a russian satellite entering the earth atmosphere. but there was not fighter plans flowing it, my father stated that if it was a russian satellite that the us would be all over it.  it was later stated that it was seen in 7 states.Well that is my story, and i am glad to finally tell someone.
content.summary: It moved very slowly over us. about 30 people there. no one said a word.  just amazed.

content.detailedDescription: A group of friends and i were roping a dummy around 7 in the afternoon waiting on my father to get home from work at the time. as the sunset was happening we looked towards the west out over the mesa of bonita canyon from the backyard. there was a really bright circle object hovering in the same place. at some points the object would go up and go down lower to the mountain. around 5 minutes after us watching it in awe 6 or so jets come from what it looks like kirtland air force base. all of them kind of side by side speeding right above our heads, low. as they get closer to the object out at the mountain behind our home they all somehow circle the object as if trying to capture it. more jets seem to appear to circle the object hovering over the mountain. it looked as if the object was getting something from that spot in the mountain. while one weird government looking plane with shining red and blue lights as if it was a cop car slowly goes down toward the light at a slow speed the object floats up a little, and just disappears! once this happens all the aircraft's zip at high speeds as if they were searching the sky for the object. they stayed flying in the air around the area till we all went to bed the night it happened. sometimes hearing the roar of the aircraft's echo off the mountain sides loud. a family friend of ours works at a gas station named phillips 66 in the town of grants, new mexico. just 5 miles away from our little village. we strike up a conversation about what had happened that night and he says a few people had actually jumped off the highway to ask if there were military planes shooting down a object. but from watching it at our house they never did get close enough to the hovering object. still to this day there is many aircraft's flying over from what seems to be kirtland air force base over to the same spot seeming to be searching for something. some days jets flying over in numbers back and forth. lately seeing them hovering in the same spot surrounded by a few other hovering government planes as if keeping watch. past two nights they have been in the same spot where the object was the day of the incident while others hover around the sky in the area. while in the area a red, fast, low, blinking plane like object flys over the area of our home.
content.summary: Over a mesa behind my house a group of friends and i witnessed a bright oval like object.

content.detailedDescription: My parents were the caretakers at north clackamas centeral park.It was around 1am in the morning and i was talking to my girlfriend on my cellphone while having a cigarette on my parents front porch. suddenly my cellphone lost signal then died. i was standing there trying to turn it back on cause i knew it was almost fully charged. as i was doing that i was suddenly aware of a craft directly above me just above treetops height, it was triangular in shape tappered at the ends with three light green whitish domes underneath. it was completely silent as was i too to be honest. it was coming from the north flying south at about 10 mph. it was either unaware of my presence or didn't care. it continued to fly south at the same speed until i lost sight of it past the treetops. i went back inside my parents place and could not sleep all night. i never told my parents about it for they would probably just think i was just crazy or making it up. i stopped staying at my parents place after that and moved in with my grandparents.
content.summary: A triangular craft flew right over me. within 500ft.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a warm early fall evening and i went outside to see if there were any fireflies that night. i saw maybe two in the cedar trees, certainly nothing like the spring of that year when there were thousands of them that appeared every night for almost a week.. what a delightful and awesome sight to see all those fireflies coming out like that. the county agent said that there were several swarms of fireflies during the same time in several locations around town and the county. my dad was city manager at the time and knew all the county officials. 
on this particular night, when nothing seemed to be happening and the small town was getting sleepy, i strolled through our yard looking at the stars (which was something i always loved to do when i was younger). i had thought of getting my telescope out that i had got for the previous christmas but it was too late and just settled for looking at the stars.  after several minutes, i noticed a string of multi-colored lights moving from the nw towards my location. when they got directly overhead, they stopped. they moved out of position and began to wander as if they were looking for something. they went back and forth and just wandered over the area for several minutes. i had gone inside to tell my dad knowing he would be interested in this since he's the city manager. he came out immediately and my mother came too to see "these strange lights that were wandering around the sky". my mother exclaimed, 'oh my gosh, what is that?' and my dad replied, 'i have no idea dear, i don't know what this or these things are'.  at that time, several of our neighbors had also come out to witness the colored lights. after about 15 minutes of wandering around in the sky right over us, they suddenly came together very slowly and formed a tight circle and hovered there in place. after less than a minute, a bright white object came towards the circle of glowing orbs and it also came from the nw. as it approached the circle, they slightly parted as if to let the white light in, and there it came to a stop in the middle of the circle of multi-colored lights. slowly, the colored light circle began to turn as if in a carnival ride. now this was getting frightening. after about 15 seconds of the circle turning, the colored lights began to peel off of the circle.  i believe the first one to leave the circle was a blue one. as it broke the circle, it headed to the sw and the rest of the colored lights also peeled off and followed the first one in a straight line. after they had traveled slowly towards the sw for 15 seconds, the bright white light left behind also joined the line as the line headed straight sw. we all watched until the lights were out of eyesight. i unknowingly had walked backwards down our street about a half block before i had realized where i was. the neighbors all congregated in our yard and discussed the incident. my dad assured them he would check it out and let them all know something. he never heard a word from anyone he contacted and that was the end of the ordeal unfortunately.
content.summary: I looked up and saw several lights of different colors and they were hovering and wandering.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't sleep. and when i do i always travel. feeling like i'm being tested on and for ?
no weird looking creatures or ships.. it's like i travel by means of thought sometimes. it's like i can almost make this place out . it feels like i'm linked to someone elsewhere. dark spot on my left side of my body i've noticed since an adolescent it's a deep down itch i almost wanna dig in it and see what's there. i go through simulations of precision .
content.summary: None

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in our backyard, i happened to look in a ne direction and observed a huge cylinder object with a square on the back of the same material.  i called my husband over and asked him what he thought it was, but neither of us knew.  it suddenly disappeared.  i don't know how no one else saw it, it was so big.  it didn't make any sound.  i often tell my husband that i just wonder what it was we saw that day, but he says that he doesn't quite remember it.
content.summary: Large cylinder slowly gliding over trees then suddenly disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out on my deck having a cigar and listening to an audio book when at about 10:30pm a light catches my eye off to the west well above the trees and nearby houses. once i focused on it, i watched its emitted light increase in intensity while transitioning from bright white to bright blue-white. i stood up and walked over to the far end of my deck while the object reached "peak" brightness. just about the time i realized that what i was looking at wasn't the usual fly-over aircraft (too low, too bright, not moving, no strobes, no sound) the object's light began to become less intense and in a matter of a few more seconds the light ceased and there was nothing there. no plane, no helicopter, no residual movement... nothing. just gone. this object was only visible for about 15 seconds from the moment i noticed it to the time it disappeared. 
 
i don't know why but, the whole experience sent chills down my spine. 

very weird.
content.summary: Oval shaped object appeared above neighborhood glowed white to white blue and faded away.

content.detailedDescription:
Me my wife at the time now my ex, and our adopted daughter were camping overnight at promised land state park in north east central pa. we had seen some activity earlier in the night as small lights appearing and disappearing but we did not think much of it. we lived in the norfolk va area and saw this all the time. me and my wife went to sleep in the back camper shell of the truck and our daughter in the front bench seat. we had a sliding window so we were in contact easily. about 2-3 am we were awoke and i was frightened and angered. i remember fighting off grey and some white beings. at first i thought it was a nightmare but, my wife had the same exact experience however she was unable to move and resist them. 
i jumped half naked out of the back of the truck to observe a bright light over the lake moving fast to the east and gaining altitude. it was being pursued by f-15 fighters about 3 of them. i recognized the sound of them and the silhouette since i had served in the us navy. they were followed by a black helo that hovered over the area for a bit. our daughter was not scared, she told us the little men told her it was ok they would not hurt us. i packed up fast and stopped at the ranger station on the way out. the rangers said it was normal recently but refused to open the door. they were not going to leave the station for any reason. their voices showed great fear. 
we made our was to i 80 rest area and we stopped. the rest area attendant asked where we had gotten the strange print on our windshield? i told him what we went thru and he offered to watch over us if we wanted to sleep a bit. the print small width, long three fingered print with no thumb they were pointed. they had disappeared by the time we woke up. 
we never spoke of this again even after our divorce a year later.
content.summary: Contacted after being waken by beings

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was stationary didn't move at all, i took about four shots of the sun beaming down at 100 degrees and then pulled into the gate of my home. when i came inside i noticed the orb. at first i though they were sun glare but after using photoshop filters i found the circle inside the glowing red orange light
content.summary: On my way into my home gate. i stopped and took a few sun pictures and that's what i saw

content.detailedDescription: This sighting was not the first occurrence.  the lantern-like orbs gave off a warm beautiful light that was calming.  they would fly up close to us, then slowly fly off towards the ocean.  they moved like birds - not like they were mechanically controlled.  the video unfortunately does not capture the size, shape or what the light that was emanating from the inside of the object.  however, it does show its flight pattern.
content.summary: Lantern like objects flying by our building then out to sea

content.detailedDescription:
I love electrical storm so i drove out to a dark area to shoot pics. upon reviewing i saw this green thing at various locations in my photos. upon cropping and zooming in one pic shows a distinct pattern.

when i saw it i believed it to be a ufo> hands down.

i was concentrating on my camera and just trying to get as many consecutive shots as possible so i could catch some good lightening strikes. i did not notice it until i looked at my photos.

there are more pics than this!
content.summary: During a lightning storm i was taking burst photoes and it showed up in several shots

content.detailedDescription: At 10:04 pm me and my wife went onto our back deck while i lit up a cigarette. my wife noticed it first and told me to look to my left (south). that's when i saw it with amazement and awe. it was shaped like a basketball ball but kinda elongated just a tad (not oblong but not full circle either). it was very orange/red with no blinking lights like a plane (but it moved like a plane). after a couple seconds i reached for my phone to turn in video. i did record but nothing showed up (too dark). as quickly as i hit record, it vanished as if it went behind clouds but tonight there weren't any clouds. i can't say for certain what it was but i can tell you what it wasn't: plane, chinese lanterns or a drone.
content.summary: Basketball shaped bright orange tint of red moved silently like plane

content.detailedDescription: My family and i with some family friends were at a neon dash marathon at retama park when at the end of the event they threw a dance of sorts. i was standing at the finish line when i noticed a group of lights in the sky. it began as 1-2 lights until more appeared which is when i began to film with my phone. i felt excited in seeing them and was not at all afraid. i lost sight of them when my son approached me that my he couldn't find his sister. by the time i found her i looked around and the lights were gone.
content.summary: Series of lights, unknown if individual or a part of a whole, slow path of travel, blinking lights, no noise

content.detailedDescription: My son & i were driving & parking within 1 mile of our residence to observe fireworks when we both noticed reddish-orange light near horizon toward south. while videoing this, several others appeared.
content.summary: While watching local fireworks in rural area, noticed multiple reddish-orange light low on horizon appearing to move faster than ahoy air balloon.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside. checking my plants when i noticed a extremely bright light due west and low in the horizon.
first i thought it was a plane, but the light was so bright and it was still light outside i did a double take. 
i got the binoculers and through them you could see it was really two pulsating very bright lights that were attached two a silver object.
it took an hour to descend under the horizon. (it dropped behind the hill and out of my sight) it slowly went south west.
feelings of curiosity.
lost sight as it dropped behind the hills
content.summary: Bright pulstating light, when seen through high powered binocs it was two glowing, pulsating spheres
